title: Children participating in cricket in England 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.

Share of respondents is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13, roughly constant from 2012/13 to 2015/16, slightly decreasing from 2015/16 to 2016/17, and lastly roughly constant from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 22.5 was reported at Year 2012/13
Minimum Share of respondents about 12.6 was reached at Year 2017/18
min_summary: Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
